EXBP.Dipren.Demo.Postgres: Deploy.commandLineArgs: deploy --database "Host = localhost; Port = 5432; Database = postgres; User ID = postgres; Password = development" --size 1000000

EXBP.Dipren.Demo.Postgres: Remove.commandLineArgs: remove --database "Host = localhost; Port = 5432; Database = postgres; User ID = postgres; Password = development"

EXBP.Dipren.Demo.Postgres: Schedule.commandLineArgs: schedule --database "Host = localhost; Port = 5432; Database = postgres; User ID = postgres; Password = development" --name dpj-002
